TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WindowPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: Represents a control that provides fundamental window-based functionality within a traditional graphical user interface (GUI).

span.span: Represents a control that provides fundamental window-based functionality within a traditional graphical user interface (GUI).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援此控制項模式的控制項範例包括最上層應用程式視窗、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)]子視窗、 強制回應對話方塊和氣球說明視窗。Examples of controls that support this control pattern include top-level application windows, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-mdi-md.md)] child windows, modal dialogs and balloon help windows.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cached As WindowPattern.WindowPatternInformation

summary.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 此結構包含的快取 [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 的控制項模式的屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的屬性值必須已先前曾要求使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用取得屬性的目前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CanMaximizeProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，根項目會傳遞至函式傳回的子系的根，而符合一組屬性條件的自動化項目集合。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of automation elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: Attempts to close the current window.

span.span: Attempts to close the current window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分割窗格控制項上呼叫時，這個方法會關閉窗格，並移除相關聯的分割。When called on a split pane control, this method will close the pane and remove the associated split. 這個方法也可以關閉所有其他窗格視實作而定。This method may also close all other panes depending on implementation. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自和後續用來關閉。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is subsequently used to close the . [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#102)]

exception.span: The control is unable to perform the requested action.

span.span: The control is unable to perform the requested action.

exception.span: When the control is no longer available.

span.span: When the control is no longer available.

summary.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含目前 [！INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 的控制項模式的屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必須從與參考，以取得目前的值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果使用取得、 它只快取資料，包含，並嘗試取得任何屬性的目前值引發例外狀況。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用取得先前使用指定之屬性的快取的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 例如，傳遞給方法的模式識別項擷取感興趣之控制項模式，從指定。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an . MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool WaitForInputIdle(int32 milliseconds) cil managed
Public Function WaitForInputIdle (milliseconds As Integer) As Boolean

param.name: milliseconds
param.span: The amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait for the associated process to become idle.

span.span: The amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait for the associated process to become idle.
The maximum is .

summary.span: Causes the calling code to block for the specified time or until the associated process enters an idle state, whichever completes first.

span.span: Causes the calling code to block for the specified time or until the associated process enters an idle state, whichever completes first.

returns.span: if the window has entered the idle state; if the timeout occurred.

span.span: if the window has entered the idle state; if the timeout occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法通常用於搭配處理。This method is typically used in conjunction with the handling of a . 實作會依賴基礎的應用程式架構。因此這個方法可能會傳回段時間之後視窗可供使用者輸入。The implementation is dependent on the underlying application framework; therefore this method may return some time after the window is ready for user input. 呼叫程式碼不應依賴此方法來確定視窗變成閒置狀態的確切時間。The calling code should not rely on this method to ascertain exactly when the window has become idle. ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自並用確認項目，則可在合理的時間內與使用者互動。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and uses to confirm the element is ready for user interaction within a reasonable amount of time. [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

exception.span: The parameter passed in is not a valid number.

span.span: The parameter passed in is not a valid number.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent WindowClosedEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly WindowClosedEvent As AutomationEvent

summary.span: Identifies the event that is raised when a window is closed.

span.span: Identifies the event that is raised when a window is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端應用程式可能需要接聽因為視窗已從快取物件從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]控制在關閉後立即檢視結構。A client application may need to listen for from a cached object since a window is removed from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] control view structure immediately upon being closed. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下列範例中，事件接聽程式的宣告和委派指定的和事件。In the following example, event listeners are declared and an delegate is specified for and events. [!code-csharp[UIAWindowPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAWindowPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAWindowPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAWindowPattern_snippets.vb#104)]
